attributes.action: Get refunds on the Flogistics Limited - b and q, comet , woolworths vouchers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of the public who brought gift vouchers from Flogistics Limited , to use in B and q, Comet, and woolworths are now faced with vouchers they can no longer use, as Flogistics Limited have gone out of business, and B and q, comet will no longer take these vouchers. When we have brought vouchers, in good faith, surley we should be safe in mind that retailers will take these from use. Please either get us a full refund of our money or make b and q and comet honnour these vouchers. This is your voters, and members of the public being riped off, and we diserve a refund and a policy being made that this cannot happen again.

rejection.details: Please contact Consumer Direct for more information http://www.consumerdirect.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
